marklogic.body: This also completely ignores the skin privilege of "Irish, Italian, Jewish, and many other minorities" in the US. Once the first Blush of greenhorn immigrant awkwardness has worn Off, most people in these ethnic groups can visually pass as unmarked members of the white majority. Now matter how much most African Americans may mimic mainstream white speech, clothing, and mannerisms, nobody will ever assume they are part of the mainstream and let them pass unmarked.
